ai-publisher-docs.description: Cloudflare Documentation Server - Get up to date reference information on Cloudflare

ai-publisher-browser.description: Browser Rendering Server - Fetch web pages, convert them to markdown and take screenshots

ai-publisher-autorag.description: AutoRAG Server - List and search documents on your AutoRAGs

ai-publisher-audit-logs.description: Audit Logs Server - Query audit logs and generate reports for review

ai-publisher-dns-analytics.description: DNS Analytics Server - Optimize DNS performance and debug issues based on current set up

ai-publisher-dex.description: Digital Experience Monitoring Server - Get quick insight on critical applications for your organization

ai-publisher-casb.description: Cloudflare One CASB Server - Quickly identify any security misconfigurations for SaaS applications to safeguard users & data
